channel.title: "close window" and text help please
channel.description: Alright so i changed what interface that pops up for the command ::rules, it used to pop up the scroll interface and i changed it to a book. Now when it pulls up the book none of the info that was on the scroll is in the book and the 'close window' button does not work, also i cannot turn the books pages, is there anyway to fix any of these problems, any help is appreciated. thanks, -deershoot3r

item.title: "close window" and text help please
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

Alright so i changed what interface that pops up for the command ::rules, it used to pop up the scroll interface and i changed it to a book. Now when it pulls up the book none of the info that was on the scroll is in the book and the ‘close window’ button does not work, also i cannot turn the books pages, is there anyway to fix any of these problems, any help is appreciated.
thanks,
-deershoot3r
